segments.text: Good morning , sir . Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to buy two bottles of brandy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about this one ? It's the special local product .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I buy these tax free ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . This is a duty-free shop .
segments.speaker: S1
